content: Students' achievements are a testament to their hard work, dedication, and resilience in the pursuit of academic and personal growth. From excelling in academics and securing top grades to showcasing talent in sports, arts, and extracurricular activities, their accomplishments reflect a well-rounded development. Participation in science fairs, debates, and cultural events highlights their creativity and critical thinking, while community service projects demonstrate their commitment to making a positive impact. These achievements not only inspire their peers but also pave the way for future opportunities, building confidence and a strong foundation for lifelong success.

In 2015, our students showcased their engineering skills and innovation by participating in the SUPRA SAEINDIA event, a national-level competition where budding engineers design, build, and race a Formula-style vehicle. This hands-on experience provided our students with valuable exposure to vehicle dynamics, powertrain optimization, and design validation, fostering technical expertise and teamwork. Their participation in SUPRA 2015 reflects our commitment to nurturing industry-ready engineers equipped with practical knowledge and a passion for automotive excellence.

Our department is proud to highlight the outstanding participation of our students in the International Go-Kart Championship (IGC) 2015, held at Lovely Professional University, Punjab. This prestigious event provided a platform for young engineers to design, fabricate, and race their own Go-Karts, applying their technical knowledge and innovative thinking. Our students demonstrated exceptional skills in vehicle design, powertrain integration, and performance optimization, competing against teams from across the country.Lovely Professional University, Punjab

Our department is thrilled to celebrate the remarkable achievement of our students in the ATV Student Grand Prix - 2K17, where they showcased their engineering expertise and innovation. Competing against top teams, our students designed and built an All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV), demonstrating excellence in vehicle dynamics, suspension, and powertrain optimization. Their dedication and technical prowess were recognized with the prestigious Best Design Award, a testament to their creativity, problem-solving skills, and teamwork. This achievement reflects our institute's commitment to fostering hands-on learning and preparing industry-ready engineers equipped with real-world experience.

Our department proudly celebrates the outstanding achievement of our students in SAE BAJA 2018, where they secured third place for Best Design. This prestigious competition challenged students to design, build, and race an All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) capable of withstanding rugged terrains and extreme conditions. Our team demonstrated exceptional skills in vehicle engineering, innovation, and design optimization, earning them national recognition. This remarkable accomplishment highlights their dedication, teamwork, and technical expertise, reinforcing our institute's commitment to practical learning and excellence in automotive engineering.

Our department takes immense pride in congratulating Mr. T.V. Sreesh for his outstanding achievement in the National Yoga Competition - 2018, where he secured the prestigious Gold Medal. His dedication, discipline, and exceptional skills in yoga have brought great honor to our institution. This remarkable accomplishment showcases his commitment to physical and mental well-being, inspiring fellow students to strive for excellence in both academics and extracurricular activities. We applaud his success and wish him continued achievements in the future.

Our department is proud to announce that our students achieved an outstanding milestone in the SAEISS Bicycle Design Challenge 2024, securing 3rd place in Best Dynamic Performance. This prestigious competition challenged teams to design and develop an innovative, high-performance bicycle with a focus on efficiency, aerodynamics, and sustainability. Our students demonstrated exceptional engineering skills, creativity, and teamwork, excelling in dynamic performance tests. This achievement highlights their dedication to practical learning and innovation, reinforcing our institute's commitment to fostering future-ready engineers.

Our department is immensely proud to congratulate B. Hariganesh for securing the University First Rank and winning the Gold Medal in Automobile Engineering for the batch of 2017-2021. His outstanding academic performance, dedication, and passion for automotive engineering have brought great honor to our institution. This remarkable achievement reflects his hard work and commitment to excellence, serving as an inspiration for future students.

Our department proudly congratulates G. Gopika, a 3rd-year Automobile Engineering student, for receiving the prestigious SAE - Foundation Section Award 2023-2024 under the Kalpana Chawla category. This esteemed recognition honors her exceptional academic performance, technical expertise, and contributions to the field of automotive engineering. Her achievement is a testament to her dedication, hard work, and passion for innovation. We celebrate her success and look forward to witnessing her future accomplishments in the industry.

images.event_name: SAEISS - Electric Two Wheeler Design Competition
images.image_content: Our department is proud to announce that our students actively participated in the SAEISS - Electric Two-Wheeler Design Competition, showcasing their expertise in sustainable mobility and innovative vehicle design. This competition provided a platform to develop an electric two-wheeler with a focus on efficiency, performance, and eco-friendly technology. Our team demonstrated exceptional skills in battery technology, powertrain integration, and aerodynamic design, gaining valuable hands-on experience in the evolving field of electric vehicles. Their participation reflects our institute's commitment to fostering innovation and industry-relevant learning in the field of automobile engineering.

Our department is proud to announce that our students successfully participated in the Smart India Hackathon 2024 Grand Finale, a prestigious national-level innovation challenge. Competing against top teams from across the country, our students showcased their problem-solving abilities, technical expertise, and creativity in developing innovative solutions for real-world challenges. Their participation in this esteemed event reflects their dedication to research, innovation, and technological advancement, reinforcing our institute's commitment to fostering future-ready engineers equipped with industry-relevant skills.

Our department proudly congratulates G. Gopika, a 3rd-year Automobile Engineering student, for securing a grant of ₹10.1 Lakhs from MSME Idea Hackathon 3.0 for her innovative project of Automatic billing machine in grocery shop. This prestigious funding recognizes her exceptional creativity, technical expertise, and entrepreneurial spirit in developing groundbreaking solutions in the automotive sector. Her achievement is a testament to her dedication and problem-solving skills, bringing pride to our institution. We celebrate her success and look forward to witnessing her future contributions to the industry.

Our department is proud to announce that our students actively participated in the SAEISS - Electric Two-Wheeler Design Competition, demonstrating their innovation and technical expertise in the field of sustainable mobility. This competition provided them with a platform to design and develop an efficient electric two-wheeler, focusing on battery technology, power management, aerodynamics, and performance optimization. Their participation highlights their dedication to cutting-edge automotive advancements and reinforces our institute's commitment to fostering future engineers equipped with industry-relevant skills in electric vehicle technology.

content: The students of the EEE department have consistently demonstrated their technical prowess by actively participating in various competitions, including project expos, paper presentations, circuit design challenges, and robotics competitions at inter-college and university levels. Their innovative research and problem-solving abilities have earned them recognition at prestigious technical symposiums and conferences. Notably, our students have presented papers on emerging technologies such as Smart Grids, Renewable Energy Systems, Electric Vehicles, and Industrial Automation, showcasing their expertise and dedication to the field. Their achievements reflect the department’s strong emphasis on academic excellence, research, and hands-on learning, inspiring future engineers to push the boundaries of innovation.

images.event_name: the 34th DAE All India Essay Contest
images.image_content: Mr.R.SARAVANAKUMAR, B.E.ECE, II-YEAR (2nd from left) is the only student participated from Tamilnadu and won III- Prize. He received a cash award of Rs.15,000/- with Free Travel, Boarding and Accommodation Allowances for his essay on “Nuclear Power-Secured Energy Source towards Atmanirbhar Bharat” at the 34th DAE All India Essay Contest on “Nuclear Science and Technology” during the Celebration of 75 Years of Independence, organized by the Department of Atomic Energy, Government of India, from 26.10.2022 to 31.10.2022 at Mumbai.
